caption.p: The cores of the fully integrated PCR systems. (A) (left) Schematic of the plastic fluidic cartridge using three electrochemical and one thermopneumatic pump; (right) Photograph of the fabricated unit, consisting of a plastic fluidic cartridge, the PCB, and the eSensor microarray chip [ 82]. (B) (up) Drawing of the all-in-one cartridge. (down) The top and bottom views of the all-in-one cartridge [ 83]. (C) (left) Photograph of the LabDisk. (right) Schematic of the LabDisk [ 84]. (D) (top left) Schematic of the cartridge; (top right) Principle of the platform; (down) Schematic of the particle transfer [ 85]. (E) (up) Schematic of the microdevice; (bottom left) View of the PCR chamber; (bottom right) View of the gel-based capture part [ 86].
